original_text: The fourth angel poured out his bowl on the sun, and it was allowed to scorch people with fire.
korean_text: 넷째 천사가 그 대접을 해에 쏟으매 해가 권세를 받아 불로 사람들을 태우니

sentences.original_text: The fourth angel poured out his bowl on the sun
sentences.korean_translation: 네 번째 천사가 자기 대접을 해 위에 쏟았습니다

sentences.original_text: and it was allowed to scorch people with fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 해는 불로 사람들을 태우도록 허락받았습니다
